text: "Bend Me, Shape Me" is a 1967 song written by Scott English and Larry Weiss. It was first performed by The Outsiders for their album In. Its better known version is by The American Breed and is the title track to the album of the same name. It went to number 1 in New Zealand, number 3 in South Africa, number 5 in the United States, number 7 in Canada, number 8 in the Netherlands and number 9 in Germany. Category:1967 songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: Bend Me, Shape Me
